# TieDIE Results
```{r}
library(igraph)
```

# KIRC
```{r}
sif_data <- read.table("output/TieDIE/input/kirc/TieDIE/tiedie.cn.sif", header = FALSE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
sif_graph <- graph_from_data_frame(sif_data[,c("V1","V3")], directed = FALSE)
plot(sif_graph, layout = layout_with_fr)
```
